content: Look to the right to find a Charface guarding a chest. Defeat the enemy then open the chest to collect Refined Iron Sand. Now face the opposite direction and go straight up the narrow path. At the other end of it, the next element cart blocks your progress.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Woods of Ember Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Height of Ember' and the sub-subsection 'Yoaguai Chief - Father of Stones'.
The content is as follows:
Look to the right to find a Charface guarding a chest. Defeat the enemy then open the chest to collect Refined Iron Sand. Now face the opposite direction and go straight up the narrow path. At the other end of it, the next element cart blocks your progress.
